definition: To bring into existence or make something happen, often referring to turning an idea or plan into reality. It is commonly used when discussing the process of achieving goals, dreams, or aspirations.

examples.english: I want to realize my dreams.

examples.german: Er hat es endlich geschafft, sein Projekt zu verwirklichen.
examples.english: He finally managed to realize his project.

examples.german: Sie verwirklichte sich als erfolgreiche Künstlerin.
examples.english: She fulfilled herself as a successful artist.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, seine Ziele zu verwirklichen.
examples.english: It is important to achieve one's goals.

examples.german: Die Firma hat große Pläne, die sie verwirklichen möchte.
examples.english: The company has big plans that it wants to implement.
